google_play_reviews.content: This app is the 8th wonder of my life. Beautiful üòä
I have been using this app for a while and recommend it but lately it will stop and start through the night for some unknown reason. Please fix this.
it keeps stopping mysteriously after 2 minutes.
perfect for sleeping

Love this app and experimenting with sounds, it's fun. I finally got the perfect brown noise to block out annoying city/neighbor sounds while still being able to listen to my podcasts and audio books.
Might be my favorite app. Have used it for years now. No dumb redesigns - consistent and simple.
This is the best app in the Play Store

The BEST basic white noise app out there! There are no looped sound recordings, just white noise. You can customize the sound hiss generated and save multiple presets - example: loud covering TV hiss, low 'wind noise', etc. If I could donate to support the Developer's other work, I would throw a few dollars their way in appreciation.
Excellent

would be interesting to see filters for the sound. ex: the noise becomes flowing water, wind, or something. also saved settings that you can select and load. that needs added, i would love that. edit: above review is from 6 years ago. save settings were indeed added, which was great. not much else has been done feature wise, but it gets the job done. also for all this time this app hasnt had any ads. ad-free white noise apps are as rare as it gets, so kudos to devs.
This is so good it deserves a nobel peace prize!
simply the best
Great app, easy to tune and experiment with different volumes across the frequency spectrum. helps me sleep without my fan when I travel.
Great for sleeping white noise without hearing a loop blip on the sound!

Very nice! It would be cool if the memory section could contain presets for 
the usual noise types (white, pink, brown etc) out of the box. Drawing 
perfect lines is hard üòú

Cancels noise. Great for sleeping and reading (especially on a plane). Very 
simple to use. I recommend keeping the volume down but of course high 
enough to cancel any unwanted noise.
Thank you Paul.  A free app that works well, doesnt require ridiculous permissions and doesn't harvest my data.
Easy to use and works great. Adding a timer would be great.
The new update causes the sound to sound different. The volume controls are much more sensitive and when pressing volume down just one time it goes down a lot more than it used to.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: That seems unlikely. Chroma Doze doesn't have its own volume control, aside from the "Reduce Volume" slider in the options menu.

google_play_reviews.content: Simple, elegant, and flexible. The best white noise app available in my opinion.  The latest version gently ramps up the sound instead of starting at full volume - a subtle but very welcome improvement.
Very nice, simple and free. Perhaps an optional fade-out after x hours could be added.
Thank you. Amazing, simple, free. Open source, customizable. No ads. I have always loved this app.
Brilliant. Best 'noise machine' app available! Something for everyone; designed my own sound in a few seconds. Listening options enhance user experience. Designer did a great job!
This is great - very simple way to generate noise in the tones you want.
I like math.
THE adjustable white noise app.
I use it all the time.
Just pure white noise and nothing else! I customize it according to my needs. Good job, Chroma Doze!
Best white noise app out there. It respects privacy, by moot asking to use your phone's camera, location, identity, storage......etc. and has a wide variety of  sounds
This is an exemplary app. It performs single purpose well with no additional permissions required. I've never had it crash or behave strangely. Excellent!

Excellent! This is extremely flexible, no looping sounds, no 'extra' sounds...nothing but white noise that you can adjust between warm and cool sounds, and clean or 'wavy'. You won't want another one after this...
I have used this app every night for years. I love how reliable and basic it is.
I LOVE PLAYING WITH IT!.as there's so many diff Sounds .you can get from this..APP!

The combination of suffering with tinnitus, and a great love of sound art, makes this app a good one to have. Its wide-ranging chromatic capabilities make it a very special one among noise apps. In short, I do indeed love it.

Amazing. You can fine tune the audio to suit your needs. You don't just get white, pink or brown noise, you can get an entire spectrum.  I suffer from Tinnitus so the ability to create an audio signal that I can use with my tinnitus and produce sounds that really do help me to sleep.  I would give it more than 5 stars. It would be nice to be able to save an audio signal to an mp3 file of maybe up to an hour?

I just installed the app and already know it will be amazing for relaxing and sleep. You can draw you own spectrum of sound, I prefer lower end brown noise in the 500mhz range....Awesome! Forget the rest this is the best, and tried quite a few.
Quality software.
laughing silent ecstasy void void void now divine
Sound is FABULOUS. But it regularly pauses for the briefest of moments totally waking me up! What am i doing wrong?
Create your own White Noise pattern. Adjust the pulse modulation. This does exactly what is needed without any clutter. Fantastic.
Does the job. Neighbour

What can I say.. Simply working fantastic!!! GREAT job dev!!!  Was gonna ask if there was a way to backup created/saved streams to external storage for example but read on Github that that option was removed? Guess that was about the build in "save/backup" option for created streams as it has back already? I am/was looking for a way to backup/transfer them to other devices too but can't find any file to copy/backup to external storage. Is there a way to do just that? Or is it possible to program such an option in? Ah well, deserves the full 5star rating anyway!! :)
No bloat, no crashes, and the new auto-start feature makes it even easier to use!  I love that you can make custom sound profiles too.
Of all the "white noise generator"s out there, this is the only one that really generates noise and doesn't play whacky "nature sounds". It's simple to use and just works.
Nice design, clear, works well.
I'm used to sleeping like garbage when I travel. This is the first app that has actually worked for me. Wow! So thankful.
Features detailed noise color controls, allowing me to match the exact frequency of my tinnitus, which made it possible for me to focus on a sound coming from outside and on my own thoughts.
I suffer from tinnitus and found this to be a good masking app. Thank you
Can we please have a display of frequencies on the equaliser? Great tool, but would be even better with some numbers.
Thanks Paul for creating and updating.  This app is a part of my day, and I am grateful. Supports better sleep, concentration and especially handy at the dentist office too.          :-  )
Cream of the crop;  just  phenomenal !
Great idea. Reasonably awesome execution!
Freakin sleep EXCELLENTLY to this.  All the left side sliders are nasa like.

I usually need to listen to NASA space sounds to sleep but,when my internet is out,this is a life saver.I can make it sound pretty much like the magnetic fields of Ganymede or Neptune.Thank you for this awesome app!!!!
This app is easy to use, looks really sharp and is very customizable. It requires no special permissions and is licensed under GPL. Beautiful!!!
A fantastic noise generator.  Thank you!
I love simple apps that don't require a million permissions to run. This one has a very small footprint, and it performs great. Excellent!

Then you've just found the last noise app you'll ever download! How many noise apps have you downloaded that give YOU complete control over every aspect of what you hear? Chromadoze is nothing short of amazing. Perfect for ANY situation where a noise buffer is desired: studies, sleep (you or the baby!), work & most importantly ANY time you desire a private conversation. Infinite noise combinations, wavelength, amplitude & volume control, app settings lock, settings save slots. All for FREE & zero adds!!
White noise is a little too bright for me. I can adjust the higher tones to make a blend of brown/pink noise. I love it!!
It's easy to use

>>Added April 2016: I honestly wish there was some way to pay for this app. I've been using it every single night for a very long time. <<  I've been using white noise to sleep for years, but a common problem is, depending on the speaker, it often doesn't have enough low end or has too much highs and can actually be distracting or irritating to me. This app solves that problem forever and I really appreciate it! I have saved settings my boombox, my bluetooth speaker & tablet... awewome
Just what I wanted. Simple, no nonsense, small app. Would be nice if it stopped on headphone disconnect, but the lock screen widget makes it easy to stop it.

It works perfectly. This app has been a lifesaver for me while I am trapped living out of a hotel room for work. I like to sleep to the sound of a fan when I am home and this is an excellent substitute. Thank you so much!
The best
This is so perfect
The best. Beautiful and simple.

If your ears make their own Symphony and it bothers you... If you hear the neighbors or people walking by your pad and it bothers you,  if you hear or feel frequencies that are sucking the life out of you and you're considering the foil hazmat suit... STOP.  You need this app.  It tunes up your brain. . And one can keep it playing even when in other apps, which I didn't think was a big deal until I tried it. üíö!!!   I am very eased by this app. Thank you. Please don't go away. ‚úåüôèüòò
Super for creating the "white noise" background you want. If it had a adjustable off timer it would be perfect!!!

No looping, no popping, no ads, no excess battery use, no excess permissions. Fully customizable sound that is leagues ahead of any 'similar' app. Only one suggestion: allow fine control of each individual bar. Still, can't say anything negative about this app.

This app is revolutionary and I love how you can create your own spectrum of sound as well as adjust the amplitude of the sound waves. The only suggestion I have is to create a spectrum with different types of sounds instead of just one digital sound, like a fan, or even the sound of rain. The generator is awesome!!! Slept well last night to this app.
This app is the absolute best at blocking out other sound. Not only that, but you can adjust the sound to whatever you like best. Thank you, creators of this wonderful app.
Now this is more like it!
Does exactly what it says, and it's a tiny install size, too. I really like being able to design my own type of noise. Very simple and creative!
Crying baby on a plane? Chroma-doze-it!
Elegant

I love the interface. I love its look and simplicity. I love the control it provides over the generation process.  I appreciate very much the fact that it is not recorded loops, but actually generating the white noise. Perfect.
This is the one. It runs in the background with separate volume control. This allows me to stack my podcast with the background white noise. I need to block out my cube mates.
I use this app to fall asleep but it drains my battery by morning. If it already has a timer where do I find it?
Exactly what I was looking for
So many things to love: completely free/no ads; easy to customize; no permissions needed; takes up little space; can play in the background while you do other things. Very cool.
Great
Simple.  No extra junk.
This app is fantastic, plus it uses math and is open source.
true generator, not looped samples. entire spectrum of color noise options. can change frequency on the fly, no need to pause. no permissions. best one available.
Great!
Not
You can set this up to perform the way you want.  No cheesy chimes or fake jungle sounds.  Very comfortable listening
Great app allowing ultimate personalization of soolthing sounds

No ads, no cheesy rainforest pan flutes, just a pure noise generator that lets you tailor your own way to block out the bullsh*t and personal demons so you can finally get some goddamn sleep around here. Use the color sliders to shape the noise from brown to pink to white and everywhere in between. Bravo!
Nifty app and handy for me. Thanks a bunch, man.
Works perfectly on moto g
